alert.note: Alert for Kittson; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:33AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Marshall, northwestern Polk, southern Kittson, northern Grand Forks, eastern Walsh and southeastern Pembina Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 733 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Donaldson to Grand Forks AFB. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Robbin and Mattson around 735 AM CDT. Donaldson and Kennedy around 740 AM CDT. Manvel around 750 AM CDT. Grand Forks around 755 AM CDT. Halma and East Grand Forks around 800 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 143 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
